item.title: Genesys Multicloud CX™ Harbor Tour

item.title: Genesys Cloud CX™️ & Google
item.description: See the power of Genesys Cloud CX and Google CCAI. Set up both integrations with Google Agent Assist and Google DialogFlow CX into your own Genesys Cloud CX instance.
